column4: Hello everyone, I have a quick question -- I have just downloaded and have been trying to install Ubuntu. When the installer starts Ubuntu freezes and the window gets distorted, only the installer window and nothing else. The background and top bar are fine. Also when this happens I cannot click on anything and I am forced to restart. Any help will be extremely appreciated!
either reburn, and burnt he image slowly, or use the alternate install CD
either way, burning slow is good practice(2-4x always works for me)
